snippet.title: Karmaflow: The Rock Opera Videogame - Act I Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Karmaflow: The Rock Opera Videogame ACT I is launched today! 
We present you the official trailer.

Karmaflow is worlds first Rock Opera Videogame. Journey through several worlds as the Karmakeeper. Find the Guardians and help them save their world... Or would you rather see it destroyed?

Singers from bands such as Epica, Dragonforce, Cradle of Filth, Sonata Arctica and many more voiced the characters in Karmaflow. 

ACT I is available now, ACT II will be released in April, and is available as a free download if you purchase ACT I now. Also included is the Original Soundtrack in MP3 format.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/317940/
http://www.karmaflowgame.com
http://www.facebook.com/karmaflowgame.com
http://www.twitter.com/karmaflowgame

Also check out http://www.karmaflowinconcert.com to check out when the on-stage Rock Opera of Karmaflow will be performed in the near future!
